DataElement.preferredName: Cell Morphology Percent Uveal Spindle Cell Melanoma Integer
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The percent of uveal melanoma arising from the choroid, ciliary body, or the iris and characterized by the presence of of spindle-shaped melanocytes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cell Morphology Percent Uveal Spindle Cell Melanoma
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Cellular morphology is the form and structure of cells, and its relation to cell function, or the scientific study thereof._A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred)._A melanoma arising from the choroid, ciliary body, or the iris.  It is characterized by the presence of spindle-shaped melanocytes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cellular morphology is the form and structure of cells, and its relation to cell function, or the scientific study thereof.

Concepts.definition: Cellular morphology is the form and structure of cells, and its relation to cell function, or the scientific study thereof.

Property.preferredName: Percent Unit Spindle Cell Uveal Melanoma
Property.preferredDefinition: A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).:A melanoma arising from the choroid, ciliary body, or the iris.  It is characterized by the presence of spindle-shaped melanocytes.

Concepts.definition: A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).
A melanoma arising from the choroid, ciliary body, or the iris.  It is characterized by the presence of spindle-shaped melanocytes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Abnormalities that occur in human cells and tissues and models of human cancer.

DataElementConcept.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 5/28/20 jk Re-release post db reload; released 5/20/20 per SME (LH) review and approval email. 5/13/20 jk created for CPTAC UVA Path CRFs.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A positive number with no fractional part between 0 and 100.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
